content: I'm actually heading to a city, and I'm planning to do some sightseeing and try out some local restaurants. My personal style is pretty casual, and I like to pack versatile pieces that can be mixed and matched. Speaking of which, I've learned to pack lightly for a weekend getaway using my packing cubes today, and I managed to fit all my essentials into a carry-on bag last time, which was super convenient. What are some essentials that I shouldn't forget to pack for a city trip?
